    • Constructor Detail

      • TieredAchievement

        public TieredAchievement(java.lang.String id,
                         int max,
                         int[] tiers)
        Create a multi-tier achievement with given ID, max progress and tiers. Max progress value should match the highest tier value.
        Parameters:
        id - internal ID of the achievement
        max - max progress of the achievement
        tiers - achievement's tiers
        See Also:
        Achievement.Achievement(String, int)

      • getClosestTier

        public int getClosestTier()
        Get the next closest tier of the achievement. That is: first tier that is not yet completed.
        Returns:
        first non-completed tier
